description: This file defines a localization utility class 'L10n' for managing multilingual support in a Flutter application. It includes localized strings for English and Hindi, methods for retrieving translated texts, and supported locales.

classes.name: L10n
classes.description: A utility class providing localized string support for the application, including language maps, translation methods, and supported locales.

methods.name: t
methods.description: Retrieves the localized string for a given key based on the current language setting.

methods.name: tn
methods.description: Retrieves a formatted localized string with parameters, substituting placeholders with provided values.

methods.name: supportedLocales
methods.description: Returns a list of supported Locale objects, here English and Hindi.
